description: A young man, unaccustomed to children, must accompany a young girl on a train trip.
name: Now or Never

description: Christ takes on the form of a pacifist count to end a senseless war.
name: Civilization

description: A tipsy doctor encounters his patient sleepwalking on a building ledge, high above the street.
name: High and Dizzy

description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

description: The cartoonist, Winsor McCay, brings the Dinosaurus back to life in the figure of his latest creation, Gertie the Dinosaur.
name: Gertie the Dinosaur

description: The simple-minded son of a rich financier must find his own way in the world.
name: The Saphead

description: When a store clerk organizes a publicity stunt, in which a friend climbs the outside of a tall building, circumstances force him to make the perilous climb himself.
name: Safety Last!

description: Nerdy college student will do anything to become popular on campus.
name: The Freshman

description: A penniless young man tries to save an heiress from kidnappers and help her secure her inheritance.
name: From Hand to Mouth

description: In this silent predecessor to the modern documentary, film-maker Robert J. Flaherty spends one year following the lives of Nanook and his family, Inuit living in the Arctic Circle.
name: Nanook of the North

description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife. Silent classic based on the story "Dracula."
name: Nosferatu

description: The struggles of a hardscrabble Iranian nomadic tribe as they journey through bleak country to reach the grasslands that will save their livestock.

name: Grass: A Nation's Battle for Life

description: Charlie is an immigrant who endures a challenging voyage and gets into trouble as soon as he arrives in America.
name: The Immigrant

name: The Last of the Mohicans

description: When three thuggish men are responsible for the death of his father and the crippling of his brother, young David must choose between supporting his family or risking his life and exacting vengeance.
name: Tol'able David

description: A dramatized account of a great Russian naval mutiny and a resulting street demonstration which brought on a police massacre.
name: Battleship Potemkin

description: With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.
name: Go West

description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.
name: The Kid

description: A con artist masquerades a Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife of an American diplomat.
name: Foolish Wives

description: In fifteenth century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.
name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame

name: Peter Pan

description: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.
name: The Big Parade

description: Mrs Erlynne, the mother of Lady Windermere - her daughter does not know about her - wants to be introduced in society, so that she can marry Lord Augustus Lorton. Lord Windermere, who ...
name: Lady Windermere's Fan

description: Salome, the daughter of Herodias, seduces her step-father/uncle Herod, governor of Judea, with a salacious dance. In return, he promises her the head of the prophet John the Baptist.
name: Salom√®

description: The Civil War divides friends and destroys families, but that's nothing compared to the anarchy in the black-ruled South after the war.
name: The Birth of a Nation

name: The Great Train Robbery

description: A bitter clown endeavors to rescue the young woman he loves from the lecherous count who once betrayed him.
name: He Who Gets Slapped

description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.
name: Sherlock Jr.

description: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.
name: The Thief of Bagdad

name: The Cheat

description: A romantic rivalry among members of a secret society becomes even tenser when one of the men is assigned to carry out an assassination.
name: The Ace of Hearts

description: A nobleman becomes the vigilante Robin Hood who protects the oppressed English people from the tyrannical Prince John.
name: Robin Hood

name: The Iron Horse

name: The Blue Bird

description: Wlliam deMille produced and directed Miss Lulu Bett, a film of extraordinary conviction and insight. It was then often the custom for unmarried women to lodge with family; thus we discover ...
name: Miss Lulu Bett

description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.
name: Greed

description: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.
name: The Gold Rush

description: A woman, with the aid of her police officer sweetheart, endeavors to uncover the prostitution ring that has kidnapped her sister, and the philanthropist who secretly runs it.
name: Traffic in Souls

description: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.
name: Les vampires

description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.
name: Our Hospitality

description: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.
